devdoc.details: Mixin for settling limit and RFQ orders.

_fillLimitOrder((address,address,uint128.details: Fill a limit order. Internal variant. ETH protocol fees can be      attached to this call.

params.takerTokenFillAmount: Maximum taker token to fill this order with.

returns.makerTokenFilledAmount: How much maker token was filled.
returns.takerTokenFilledAmount: How much maker token was filled.

_fillRfqOrder((address,address,uint128,u.details: Fill an RFQ order. Internal variant. ETH protocol fees can be      attached to this call. Any unspent ETH will be refunded to      `msg.sender` (not `sender`).

params.takerTokenFillAmount: Maximum taker token to fill this order with.

returns.makerTokenFilledAmount: How much maker token was filled.
returns.takerTokenFilledAmount: How much maker token was filled.

batchCancelLimitOrders((address,address,.details: Cancel multiple limit orders. The caller must be the maker.      Silently succeeds if the order has already been cancelled.

batchCancelPairLimitOrders(address[],add.details: Cancel all limit orders for a given maker and pair with a salt less      than the value provided. The caller must be the maker. Subsequent      calls to this function with the same caller and pair require the      new salt to be >= the old salt.

batchCancelPairRfqOrders(address[],addre.details: Cancel all RFQ orders for a given maker and pair with a salt less      than the value provided. The caller must be the maker. Subsequent      calls to this function with the same caller and pair require the      new salt to be >= the old salt.

batchCancelRfqOrders((address,address,ui.details: Cancel multiple RFQ orders. The caller must be the maker.      Silently succeeds if the order has already been cancelled.

batchGetLimitOrderRelevantStates((addres.details: Batch version of `getLimitOrderRelevantState()`, without reverting.      Orders that would normally cause `getLimitOrderRelevantState()`      to revert will have empty results.

returns.actualFillableTakerTokenAmounts: How much of each order is fillable         based on maker funds, in taker tokens.
returns.isSignatureValids: Whether each signature is valid for the order.

batchGetRfqOrderRelevantStates((address,.details: Batch version of `getRfqOrderRelevantState()`, without reverting.      Orders that would normally cause `getRfqOrderRelevantState()`      to revert will have empty results.

returns.actualFillableTakerTokenAmounts: How much of each order is fillable         based on maker funds, in taker tokens.
returns.isSignatureValids: Whether each signature is valid for the order.

cancelLimitOrder((address,address,uint12.details: Cancel a single limit order. The caller must be the maker.      Silently succeeds if the order has already been cancelled.

cancelPairLimitOrders(address,address,ui.details: Cancel all limit orders for a given maker and pair with a salt less      than the value provided. The caller must be the maker. Subsequent      calls to this function with the same caller and pair require the      new salt to be >= the old salt.

cancelPairRfqOrders(address,address,uint.details: Cancel all RFQ orders for a given maker and pair with a salt less      than the value provided. The caller must be the maker. Subsequent      calls to this function with the same caller and pair require the      new salt to be >= the old salt.

cancelRfqOrder((address,address,uint128,.details: Cancel a single RFQ order. The caller must be the maker.      Silently succeeds if the order has already been cancelled.

fillLimitOrder((address,address,uint128,.details: Fill a limit order. The taker and sender will be the caller.

params.order: The limit order. ETH protocol fees can be      attached to this call. Any unspent ETH will be refunded to      the caller.
params.takerTokenFillAmount: Maximum taker token amount to fill this order with.

returns.makerTokenFilledAmount: How much maker token was filled.
returns.takerTokenFilledAmount: How much maker token was filled.

fillOrKillLimitOrder((address,address,ui.details: Fill an RFQ order for exactly `takerTokenFillAmount` taker tokens.      The taker will be the caller. ETH protocol fees can be      attached to this call. Any unspent ETH will be refunded to      the caller.

params.takerTokenFillAmount: How much taker token to fill this order with.

returns.makerTokenFilledAmount: How much maker token was filled.

fillOrKillRfqOrder((address,address,uint.details: Fill an RFQ order for exactly `takerTokenFillAmount` taker tokens.      The taker will be the caller. ETH protocol fees can be      attached to this call. Any unspent ETH will be refunded to      the caller.

params.takerTokenFillAmount: How much taker token to fill this order with.

returns.makerTokenFilledAmount: How much maker token was filled.

fillRfqOrder((address,address,uint128,ui.details: Fill an RFQ order for up to `takerTokenFillAmount` taker tokens.      The taker will be the caller. ETH should be attached to pay the      protocol fee.

params.takerTokenFillAmount: Maximum taker token amount to fill this order with.

returns.makerTokenFilledAmount: How much maker token was filled.
returns.takerTokenFilledAmount: How much maker token was filled.

getLimitOrderHash((address,address,uint1.details: Get the canonical hash of a limit order.

getLimitOrderInfo((address,address,uint1.details: Get the order info for a limit order.

getLimitOrderRelevantState((address,addr.details: Get order info, fillable amount, and signature validity for a limit order.      Fillable amount is determined using balances and allowances of the maker.

returns.actualFillableTakerTokenAmount: How much of the order is fillable         based on maker funds, in taker tokens.

getProtocolFeeMultiplier().details: Get the protocol fee multiplier. This should be multiplied by the      gas price to arrive at the required protocol fee to fill a native order.

getRfqOrderHash((address,address,uint128.details: Get the canonical hash of an RFQ order.

getRfqOrderInfo((address,address,uint128.details: Get the order info for an RFQ order.

getRfqOrderRelevantState((address,addres.details: Get order info, fillable amount, and signature validity for an RFQ order.      Fillable amount is determined using balances and allowances of the maker.

returns.actualFillableTakerTokenAmount: How much of the order is fillable         based on maker funds, in taker tokens.

registerAllowedRfqOrigins(address[],bool.details: Mark what tx.origin addresses are allowed to fill an order that      specifies the message sender as its txOrigin.

params.allowed: True to register, false to unregister.
params.origins: An array of origin addresses to update.

transferProtocolFeesForPools(bytes32[]).details: Transfers protocol fees from the `FeeCollector` pools into      the staking contract.
